title: Altis
description: A volcanic island with a corrugated and mostly rocky landscape.

title: BW Training Base
description: A small desert terrain that is dedicated to training Blackwater contractors.

title: Diyala
description: A province in Iraq that begins near Baghdad and extends to the Iranian border.

title: Fallujah
description: A city terrain based on the Fallujah region of Iraq with houses, dams and bridges.

title: Khoramshahr
description: An arid micro-terrain of Iran with a number of cities and highways.

title: Kunduz
description: A detailed mountainous terrain based on a real area of Kunduz, Afghanistan.

title: Lythium
description: Tribal regions of Afghanistan with a large valley, cities and villages.

title: Malden
description: Semi-arid, mountainous landscape with stubby trees and shrubbery.

title: PR F.A.T.A
description: Tribal region of Pakistan with mountainous terrain and populated villages.

title: Stratis
description: A volcanic region with rocky crevices, steep valleys and vast pine forests.

title: Tanoa
description: A South Pacific archipelago with tropical flora, dense jungle and rough terrain.
